Important things after installation.

* memtest

- memtest86+
  badblocks -swo out /dev/sdX

* Unnattended upgrades

- apticron
- unnattended-upgrades

* Cleaners

- deborphan
- debfoster

* Security

- debian-security-support

* Logs

- logcheck

* Hardware

- smartmontools
- mcelog
- lm-sensors

* System monitoring

- sysstat
- molly-guard

* Remove

#+BEGIN_EXAMPLE
rm -rf /usr/lib/libfoo.so
#+END_EXAMPLE

- safe-rm
#+BEGIN_EXAMPLE
rm -rf /usr/lib
safe-rm: skipping /usr/lib
#+END_EXAMPLE

- etckeeper
